## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                      | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `bannerText` | `banner-text` | The banner text for this card. Used in the card category banner. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `faceDown`   | `face-down`   | True if the element is face down, otherwise false.               | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                 | Description                                   |
| -------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `--accent`           | The accent colour for both sides of the card. |
| `--back-background`  | Back side background colour.                  |
| `--front-background` | Front side background colour.                 |
